name.ja: <ruby>儀<rt>ぎ</rt></ruby><ruby>水<rt>すい</rt></ruby><ruby>鏡<rt>きょう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>集<rt>しゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>光<rt>こう</rt></ruby>

text.en: Add 1 "Gishki" monster from your Deck to your hand. During the End Phase, if you control a WATER Ritual Monster: You can banish this card from your GY; Set 1 "Aquamirror" Spell/Trap from your Deck or GY, except "Aquamirror Focalization". You can only use this effect of "Aquamirror Focalization" once per turn.
